HomePage.description:
Specializing in Full-Stack Development and DevOps.

I build modern web applications and scalable infrastructure.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: passionate about devops and web development to build scalable and efficient solutions.
about.bio1: I am Mohamed Wafi, a licence graduate in full-stack development, passionate about web development and graduate from Software Engineering.
about.bio2: I have a strong expertise in designing and developing web applications, managing cloud infrastructure, and implementing DevOps practices to streamline development workflows.
about.bio3: Skilled in cloud deployment, full-stack development, and data engineering, I enjoy turning complex data and algorithms into scalable, high-impact solutions.
about.mlDesc: Supervised & unsupervised learning, CNN, LSTM, Transformers for real-world applications.
about.nlpDesc: Text mining, BERT, mT5, TF-IDF, RAG for intelligent text processing and generation.
about.cvDesc: YOLOv8, Mask R-CNN, ResNet-50, OpenCV for detection, segmentation, and classification.
about.cloudDesc: Azure, AWS, Docker, Flask, FastAPI for scalable AI solutions deployment.
about.availableForPFE: Available for PFE Internship starting February 2026
